entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet-install fails (local, CI) #39446
  • Route syntax highlighting and autocompletion #39441
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Problem building this repo #39440
  • Razor compiler does not produce deterministic builds #39438
  • ContentDispositionHeaderValue should always add quotes to filename #39435
  • Razor Support (`Results.Page()`, etc.) for Minimal Endpoints #39431
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Support Form binding for Minimal endpoints #39430
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Enable/Enhance response caching using Etag Filter for Minimal APIs endpoints #39429
    .NET 7 Planning

Closed

  • Explore removing inline module script for Blazor Wasm #36805
    7.0-preview1
  • ComponentHubReliabilityTest are unreliable #19666
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Flaky test: Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.FunctionalTests #31464
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Optional parameter defaults in Controller Method are ignored. #38440
    7.0-preview1
  • Warnings when running a .NET 7 Blazor app #39283
    .NET 7.0
  • CSS isolation does not work when Razor runtime compilation is enabled #38889
  • Same type claims are merged when they get to the client side #39144
  • .NET 6 Blazor server app not Disposing razor pages on browser tab close #39370
  • AuthorizeView causes visible UI flashes when using a policy that awaits an async operation in .NET 6 #39386
  • New project "The remote party closed the Web Socket connection without completing the Close Handshake" #39413
  • [Feature request] [blazor] :Smarter value initialization for blazor's lifecycle #39400
  • Net Core 6 Blazor Server Hot Reload is Slow for Big Projects #32867
    .NET 7 Planning

PullRequests

Created

  • Added IServiceProvider to DataAnnotationsValidator #39445
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Enable IDE0059 #39434
    area-infrastructure
  • Preserve UseUrls() setting when configuration sources are cleared #39433
    area-runtime

Merged

  • Remove double publish of windows assets #39439
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • Use default if no value was bound for parameter #39427
    area-mvc, 7.0-preview1
  • Unquarantine Http3 Tests #39424
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • [wasm] dotnet.js modularization #38721
    area-blazor, auto-merge, .NET 7.0
  • Bump up warning level for CA1822 #39436
    7.0-preview1
  • Fix some fast up to date check issues in VS #32140
    area-infrastructure, retrospective-action, 7.0-preview1

Updated

  • Warn that UseStartup/Configure/ConfigureWebHost not supported on WebApplicationBuilder #35884
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Trim "Async" Suffix #39128
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Added API analyzer functionality for conditional return expressions #39242
    community-contribution, pr: pending author input, area-web-frameworks
  • Added support for binding the raw request body #39388
    area-runtime
  • feat (FeatureCollection): Add `IFeatureCollection.GetRequiredFeature` extension method #39192
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Upgrade Playwright #38414
    area-infrastructure, area-blazor, 7.0-preview1
  • [WIP] ANCM + Arm64 + helix #39420
    area-infrastructure
  • Update Windows 10 SDK to 22000. #39422
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Detect HTTP/1.1 on HTTP/2 connection #39358
    area-runtime
  • Refactor (WebJS) - Fix some ESLint warnings #39408
    area-blazor, community-contribution
